titleStmt.title: The strange and marueilous newes lately come from the great kingdome of Chyna which adioyneth to the East Indya. Translated out of the Castlyn tongue, by T.N.
titleStmt.author: Nicholas, Thomas, b. ca. 1532, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Nigh vnto the three Cranes in the Vintree, by Thomas Gardyner, and Thomas Dawson,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Straunge newes from Chyna.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
